name: Floppy Cube (Wolf)
description:
Floppy Cube! Play a little Cube that Flops through Pillars. There are color unlocks by reaching high score milestones. Try to reach 2500 High Score to unlock everything. This isn't your grandpa's Flappy Game.

You will fail, you will fail hard. Try again. Pro Tip - This isn't like Flappy Bird, don't mash, finesse your way through the pillars, less is more.

Controls: Space Bar

Made By: Wolf

twitch.tv/wolfofodin

Music by: Technoaxe - https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Technoaxe

Sound Effects by: https://www.zapsplat.com
